goal.en: This is an elementary course that continues the lessons taught in the previous semester. After successful completion of the course, students should be able to: 1. Acquire an understanding and learn the applications of the –te and –nai forms of Japanese verbs. 2. Become familiar with the tenses of adjectives and the applications of negative/positive sentences. 3. Apply adjective and verb patterns in daily expressions. 4. Acquire the ability to and develop an interest in pursuing intermediate-level Japanese.
goal.ch: 本課程為初級課程，銜接上學期課程，修完本課程後，學生應能: 1.習得動詞te形、nai形句型應用。 2.熟悉形容詞時態及肯定、否定句型應用。 3.能使用形容詞句型與動詞句型表達與生活有關的事物。 4.培養進一步向上學習的興趣。具備繼續學習中級日語的能力。

content.en:
The course finds its main textbook in “Japanese for Everyone” (Elementary), focusing on Units 7~14 to help students learn the essential vocabulary and sentence patterns needed for daily communication. The instructor will pay special attention to the following aspects of Japanese learning:
1. Pronunciation: Practice pronouncing and writing “gojuon” syllable by syllable and learning basic vocabulary and daily greetings through pronunciation lessons.
2. Textbook Units: Master new words and sentence patterns; practice vocabulary and sentence combination; individual practice of oral communication skills; group conversation exercises.
3. Teaching Approach: Regular lectures on vocabulary and sentence patterns; actual and picture display plus audio-video teaching materials; intensive drills and interactive conversation practices for encouraging students to make speaking Japanese an essential part of daily life.
content.ch:
以「大家的日本語初級I」為主要教材，課程範圍第7課到第14課。學習日常生活必備基本語彙及基本句型表達。
1.發音：逐字練習五十音，加強個別發音及書寫練習。於發音課程中導入單字，學習日常問候語。
2.各課：認識單字、理解句型、組合使用、個別口頭練習、分組會話演練。
3.教學方式：認識單字、講解句型。使用圖片﹑實物及視聽教材輔助教學，以互動方式練習會話，熟練各課基本句型，反覆開口說日語。
